messages.content:
<your_role>
Research current facts and figures for content
</your_role>

<instructions>
Fetch real-time data as of March 31, 2025, related to 'productivity tips for remote work' for an SEO-optimized blog. Include:
1. The latest statistics or facts from credible web sources (e.g., travel reports, news articles, industry blogs).
2. Trending discussions or insights from X posts, YouTube videos/comments, Reddit threads, Hacker News posts, and other relevant social platforms (e.g., hashtags, sentiments, key topics).
3. A concise summary linking the data to the keyword and suggesting how it can enhance SEO relevance.
If a content gap analysis is provided below, incorporate it to identify unique angles or underserved topics competitors may have missed. 

---BEGIN GAP ANALYSIS---
**  
1. **Underserved Niche: Productivity for Hybrid Workers**  
   - Most content focuses on fully remote work, but hybrid workers face unique challenges (e.g., shifting between home/office, inconsistent routines).  
   - Opportunity: Address hybrid-specific strategies like flexible scheduling, adapting to changing environments, and seamless task transitions.
---END GAP ANALYSIS---
Return the response in JSON format with fields: 'stats' (list of facts with sources and dates), 'social_insights' (list of trends with platform, sentiment, and examples), and 'summary' (text tying it to the keyword and SEO goals).

Keep your response concise, with 3-5 stats and 2-3 social insights at most.
</instructions>

Fetch real-time data as of March 31, 2025, related to 'productivity tips for remote work' for an SEO-optimized blog. Include:
1. The latest statistics or facts from credible web sources (e.g., travel reports, news articles, industry blogs).
2. Trending discussions or insights from X posts, YouTube videos/comments, Reddit threads, Hacker News posts, and other relevant social platforms (e.g., hashtags, sentiments, key topics).
3. A concise summary linking the data to the keyword and suggesting how it can enhance SEO relevance.
If a content gap analysis is provided below, incorporate it to identify unique angles or underserved topics competitors may have missed. 

---BEGIN GAP ANALYSIS---
**  
1. **Underserved Niche: Productivity for Hybrid Workers**  
   - Most content focuses on fully remote work, but hybrid workers face unique challenges (e.g., shifting between home/office, inconsistent routines).  
   - Opportunity: Address hybrid-specific strategies like flexible scheduling, adapting to changing environments, and seamless task transitions.
---END GAP ANALYSIS---
Return the response in JSON format with fields: 'stats' (list of facts with sources and dates), 'social_insights' (list of trends with platform, sentiment, and examples), and 'summary' (text tying it to the keyword and SEO goals).

Keep your response concise, with 3-5 stats and 2-3 social insights at most.
I am fetching the latest news related to 'productivity tips for remote work' to gather real-time data for your blog.

[
  {
    "date": "2025-03-28T14:00:00+00:00",
    "title": "I Manage an Entirely Remote Team \u2014 These Are the 5 Strategies That Helped Us Reach Maximum Productivity",
    "body": "Remote work is on the rise \u2014 it has been since the pandemic. According to the U.S. Bureau of Labor Statistics, approximately 27% of businesses have their employees doing partially or fully remote work.",
    "url": "https://www.msn.com/en-us/technology/tech-companies/i-manage-an-entirely-remote-team-these-are-the-5-strategies-that-helped-us-reach-maximum-productivity/ar-AA1BQGjS",
    "image": "https://img-s-msn-com.akamaized.net/tenant/amp/entityid/AA1BQGjF.img?w=2000&h=1333&m=4&q=81",
    "source": "Entrepreneur"
  },
  {
    "date": "2025-03-19T08:02:36+00:00",
    "title": "Working from home: top tips to maximise your productivity away from the office",
    "body": "We've gathered the best productivity tips to help you thrive in a WFH setup Home workers can now likely be divided into two categories: those who find it impossible to step away from the omnipresent laptop, and those who struggle to get any work done in ...",
    "url": "https://www.msn.com/en-gb/lifestyle/lifestylegeneral/working-from-home-top-tips-to-maximise-your-productivity-away-from-the-office/ar-AA1BdqKR",
    "image": "https://static.standard.co.uk/2024/11/28/17/28105044-7a6785c0-3fd5-40f0-b13f-0e5b8210e6d1.jpg?width=1200&auto=webp&quality=75",
    "source": "Evening Standard"
  },
  {
    "date": "2025-03-28T12:15:00+00:00",
    "title": "Remote Workplace Engagement: Tech Experts' Top Tools And Strategies",
    "body": "Tech industry leaders have the inside track when it comes to the technology and strategies that can enhance remote workplace culture.",
    "url": "https://www.forbes.com/councils/forbestechcouncil/2025/03/28/remote-workplace-engagement-tech-experts-top-tools-and-strategies/",
    "image": "https://imageio.forbes.com/specials-images/imageserve/67e566104f2a54cabfb0dd4a/0x0.jpg?format=jpg&height=900&width=1600&fit=bounds",
    "source": "Forbes"
  },
  {
    "date": "2025-03-26T15:00:00+00:00",
    "title": "Six Sigma for Remote Work: Maintaining Productivity and Quality",
    "body": "Key Points When it comes to remote work, there is no substitute for good processes.\u00a0 The unfortunate truth is that while remote work is popular, it still has its challenges, including avoiding distractions.",
    "url": "https://www.msn.com/en-us/technology/tech-companies/six-sigma-for-remote-work-maintaining-productivity-and-quality/ar-AA1BHDQF",
    "image": "https://img-s-msn-com.akamaized.net/tenant/amp/entityid/AA1rPwCZ.img?w=2560&h=1440&m=4&q=35",
    "source": "isixsigma"
  },
  {
    "date": "2020-08-20T13:09:00+00:00",
    "title": "8 Tips to Stay Engaged as a Remote Worker",
    "body": "For example, in a survey of 120 company executives, 44% said productivity improved when employees switched to remote work, according to PwC's U.S. Remote Work Survey, published in June.",
    "url": "https://money.usnews.com/money/blogs/outside-voices-careers/articles/tips-to-stay-engaged-as-a-remote-worker-now-and-after-the-pandemic",
    "image": "",
    "source": "U.S. News & World Report"
  }
]

message.content:
Fetch real-time data as of March 31, 2025, related to 'productivity tips for remote work' for an SEO-optimized blog. Include:
1. The latest statistics or facts from credible web sources (e.g., travel reports, news articles, industry blogs).
2. Trending discussions or insights from X posts, YouTube videos/comments, Reddit threads, Hacker News posts, and other relevant social platforms (e.g., hashtags, sentiments, key topics).
3. A concise summary linking the data to the keyword and suggesting how it can enhance SEO relevance.
If a content gap analysis is provided below, incorporate it to identify unique angles or underserved topics competitors may have missed. 

---BEGIN GAP ANALYSIS---
**  
1. **Underserved Niche: Productivity for Hybrid Workers**  
   - Most content focuses on fully remote work, but hybrid workers face unique challenges (e.g., shifting between home/office, inconsistent routines).  
   - Opportunity: Address hybrid-specific strategies like flexible scheduling, adapting to changing environments, and seamless task transitions.
---END GAP ANALYSIS---
Return the response in JSON format with fields: 'stats' (list of facts with sources and dates), 'social_insights' (list of trends with platform, sentiment, and examples), and 'summary' (text tying it to the keyword and SEO goals).

Keep your response concise, with 3-5 stats and 2-3 social insights at most.

formatted_tool_calls: duckduckgo_news(query=productivity tips for remote work, max_results=5)

duckduckgo_search.name: duckduckgo_search
duckduckgo_search.description: Use this function to search DuckDuckGo for a query.

max_results.description: (optional, default=5) The maximum number of results to return.

duckduckgo_news.name: duckduckgo_news
duckduckgo_news.description: Use this function to get the latest news from DuckDuckGo.

max_results.description: (optional, default=5) The maximum number of results to return.

function.name: duckduckgo_search
function.description: Use this function to search DuckDuckGo for a query.

max_results.description: (optional, default=5) The maximum number of results to return.

function.description: Use this function to get the latest news from DuckDuckGo.
